summary: This is an email from July 10, 2019, discussing potential assistance for C20 (likely an FBI or law enforcement unit) to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence the following day for digital media and computer equipment. Most of C20 is noted to be in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: CC'ed on the email regarding assistance for executing a search warrant at Epstein's residence; appears to be a supervisory law enforcement official coordinating the operation.

events.title: Planned search warrant execution at Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: C20 (law enforcement unit) plans to execute a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

keyFacts: On July 10, 2019, planning was underway for a search warrant execution at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence the following day (July 11, 2019).
The search aimed to seize digital media and computer equipment from Epstein's residence.
Most of the C20 law enforcement unit was in Florida interviewing victims at the time, requiring additional assistance for the Manhattan operation.
The email indicates ongoing, coordinated investigative activity targeting Epstein's properties shortly before his arrest in July 2019.
